column4: Hello. Can someone tell me how to enable root account (and make password) on new newly installed ubuntu 8.04 please?
nope.. but we can tell you not to =)
try !root or !sudo for some bot nagging =)
the root password isn't set by default.. and it shouldn't be.. but I think you can use passwd to enable it.. check the man page for syntax.. and think again before using it.. please
